author: Maura Forrest and Andy Blatchford
title: Trudeau urges Canadians to stay the course in face of bleak coronavirus reports
description: Public health officials warned that even with strong control measures, the pandemic could infect between one and 10 percent of Canadians and cause between 4,400 and 44,000 deaths.
content: Deputy Prime Minister Chrystia Freeland acknowledged that Thursdays numbers will likely frighten people. But what I would also like to say is information is power and facts are powerful, Freeland told a press conference later in the day. Turn that very unders… [+3455 chars]
